attributes.action: stand down and let someone who will do the job properly sort the country out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that the nation has gone to pieces, hundreds of thousands of immigrants are flowing all over the country. people are being stabbed, shot and assaulted. this is only the start of a list of many issues that have been put before a labour government and absolutely nothing has been done about and there fore i feel they need replacing with someone who is not afraid to stand up to the problems and deal with them not just rename the problems and wait for them to reoccour.
